MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void SetLatestEventInfo (Android.Content.Context? context, Java.Lang.ICharSequence? contentTitle, Java.Lang.ICharSequence? contentText, Android.App.PendingIntent? contentIntent);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetLatestEventInfo(class Android.Content.Context context, class Java.Lang.ICharSequence contentTitle, class Java.Lang.ICharSequence contentText, class Android.App.PendingIntent contentIntent) cil managed

abstract member SetLatestEventInfo : Android.Content.Context * Java.Lang.ICharSequence * Java.Lang.ICharSequence * Android.App.PendingIntent -> unit override this.SetLatestEventInfo : Android.Content.Context * Java.Lang.ICharSequence * Java.Lang.ICharSequence * Android.App.PendingIntent -> unit

Docs.param: The context for your application / activity.
The title that goes in the expanded entry.
The text that goes in the expanded entry.

The intent to launch when the user clicks the expanded notification. If this is an activity, it must include the android.content.Intent#FLAG_ACTIVITY_NEW_TASK flag, which requires that you take care of task management as described in the Tasks and Back Stack document.
Docs.summary: Sets the #contentView field to be a view with the standard "Latest Event" layout.

format.a: Java documentation for android.app.Notification.setLatestEventInfo(android.content.Context, java.lang.CharSequence, java.lang.CharSequence, android.app.PendingIntent).

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.param: The context for your application / activity.
The title that goes in the expanded entry.
The text that goes in the expanded entry.

The intent to launch when the user clicks the expanded notification. If this is an activity, it must include the android.content.Intent#FLAG_ACTIVITY_NEW_TASK flag, which requires that you take care of task management as described in the Tasks and Back Stack document.
